entries.meaning: (US) A waiter or waitress who serves customers, especially in their vehicles, at a drive-in restaurant, sometimes on rollerskates.
examples: I ended my aimless-roaming-short-term-odd-jobs lifestyle and joyfully went to work at a local restaurant in Langley Park, Maryland, as a carhop.

verbs.description: carhop (third-person singular simple present carhops, present participle carhopping, simple past and past participle carhopped)
